movies.title: The Great Raid
movies.plot: As World War II rages, the elite Sixth Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

events.title: the Rangers reach Balincarin, five miles north of the camp
Alamo Scouts Lt. Bill Nellist and Pvt. Rufo Vaquilar secure an abandoned shack near the camp
prisoners are rescued from a Japanese camp in the Raid at Cabanatuan
the freed prisoners are moved to safety
